/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is a vibrant display of urban life, lined with lush green trees that provide a refreshing contrast to the concrete structures. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars, parked and in motion, add a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with wispy white clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the depth and perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene.
